text: Morgan Neville (born October 10, 1967) is an American movie producer, director and writer. His best known movies were 20 Feet from Stardom, which won him the Academy Award for Best Documentary Feature in 2014 as well as a Grammy Award for Best Music Film, and Won't You Be My Neighbor?, a documentary about Fred Rogers, in June 2018, got critical acclaim and became the highest grossing biographical-documentary of all time. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Tremolo Productions * Category:Academy Award winning directors Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Los Angeles
title: Morgan Neville
